error.signature: Error from server: admission webhook denied the request

verdict.summary: A validating or mutating admission webhook rejected the API request. The resource does not comply with the webhook's policy.

dead_ends.action: Delete the webhook configuration to bypass validation
dead_ends.why_fails: Removes security policies — the webhook exists for a reason and may be required by compliance

dead_ends.action: Retry the same request hoping it will pass
dead_ends.why_fails: Admission webhooks are deterministic — same input yields same denial

workarounds.action: Read the denial message to understand which policy was violated and fix the resource spec
workarounds.how: kubectl apply -f resource.yaml 2>&1 | grep 'denied the request' — the message usually explains exactly what's wrong

workarounds.action: Check which webhooks are configured and their rules: kubectl get validatingwebhookconfigurations,mutatingwebhookconfigurations
workarounds.how: kubectl get validatingwebhookconfigurations -o yaml to see rules and namespaceSelector

leads_to.condition: when the webhook is a Pod Security Admission controller

preceded_by.condition: when fixing a crashed pod with a new spec that doesn't pass admission

frequently_confused_with.distinction: Admission webhook denial is a policy check on the resource content, while Forbidden is an RBAC authorization failure on the user/service account
